attributes.action: Stop the opposition from blocking a General Election if asked for.
attributes.additional_details: The opposition has been saying they want a General Election. when offered it they turn it down because it does not suit them.  This should not be allowed and needs changing so that the people can have their say on who should rule.  It is obvious on the streets that the people want a General Election so that they can get a Government to implement the referendum so that we can get on and deal with everything else that needs doing in the country.
attributes.background: Prime minister has called for a General Election which has been blocked 3 times now.
